name: SLING / SLAM
description:
W/A/S/D keys to move

Esc to open menu

R to reset level

Best played with a mouse.

This is my first game project. Thank you for playing and feedback is always appreciated! (https://twitter.com/Skitcatt)

Solutions if you're stuck: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PWDa5hRqk8o&list=PLuJp9Yy1nBHCx7ckddmcUORhC285t2...

Tileset: https://opengameart.org/content/sci-fi-platformer-tiles-32x32

Music: https://freesound.org/people/Magntron/sounds/335571/
